00008 namespace sevent
00009 {
00010     namespace serialize
00011     {
00012         template<typename T>
00013         class SharedArraySerializer
00014         {
00015             public:
00016                 typedef T value_type;
00017                 typedef datastruct::SharedArray<T> shared_array_type;
00018                 typedef boost::shared_ptr<shared_array_type> shared_array_ptr;
00019 
00020             public:
00021                 static serialize::BaseResult_ptr serialize(boost::any& data)
00022                 {
00023                     shared_array_ptr a = boost::any_cast<shared_array_ptr>(data);
00024                     value_type* arr = a->array().get();
00025                     unsigned size = a->size() * sizeof(value_type);
00026                     char* withEnd = new char[size + 1];  // Plus 1 for endianess
00027                     memcpy(withEnd, arr, size);
00028                     withEnd[size] = myEndianess();
00029                     return serialize::ConstPtrResult::make(
00030                                 reinterpret_cast<const char*>(withEnd),
00031                                 size + 1);
00032                 }
00033 
00034                 static boost::any deserialize(datastruct::MutableCharArray_ptr serialized)
00035                 {
00036                     value_type* data = reinterpret_cast<value_type*>(serialized->data);
00037                     unsigned size = (serialized->size-1)/sizeof(value_type); // Minus 1 for endianess
00038                     shared_array_ptr arr = boost::make_shared<shared_array_type>(
00039                                                 boost::shared_array<value_type>(data),
00040                                                 size);
00041                     Endianess endianess = static_cast<Endianess>(serialized->data[serialized->size-1]);
00042                     if(endianess != myEndianess())
00043                     {
00044                         for(int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00045                         {
00046                             data[i] = endianSwap<value_type>(data[i]);
00047                         }
00048                     }
00049                     return arr;
00050                 }
00051         };
